import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../../../state/ducks/user/actions' import { Form, Input, Button, Checkbox } from 'antd' import { UserOutlined, LockOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const { Item } = Form const LoginForm = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const onFinish = (event) => { const { email, password, remember } = event let payload = {} payload.email = email payload.password = password payload.remember = remember dispatch(login(payload)) } return (
